channel.title: Help with shield animation
channel.description:
ok i need to make my dfs act like a shield like... dragon [] so that it moves with you and don't stay still when ur arm moves most ppl should know what i mean if not ill explain better
kinda like this for a wep [code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587) // D scimmy { return 451;[/code]

item.title: Help with shield animation
item.dc:creator: @omgwater omgwater
item.description:
@omgwater wrote:

i am not sure that is why i am asking~ didn’t look like it o.0

but lets say im adding a new wepon like whip…

i have to make it swing the wep right walk with it right ect… im wanting to do the same thing with dfs…

here is the problem to make it easier…
working~ i am wearing a whip, “DRAGON SQUAR SHIELD”, and a skill cape. i do the skill cape emote and the animation on the emote lifts my arms up over your head like a yawn? works perfect my whip and dragon shield both move with my arms right…

NON working~ i am wearing whip, “DFS”, and a skill cape i do the skill cape emote and the animation does like above exept my “DFS” stays in place it does not lift or move with my char it just floats there till my arm is back in place… (if pic needed ill add)

typo in pic ment to be char not car…

Read full topic
